detectors.description:
TRID.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#83-88) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#85)
detectors.markdown:
[TRID.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#L83-L88) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#L85)

detectors.description:
TRID.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#90-96) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#91)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#93)

detectors.description:
TRID.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#65-67) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _totalSupply - balances[address(0)] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#66)

detectors.description: Variable TRID._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#45) is not in mixedCase

TRID.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#55-63) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 75000000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#59)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- TRID.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#65-67)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#14)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- TRID.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#69-71)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#15)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- TRID.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#73-75)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#16)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TRID.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#83-88)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#17)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TRID.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#77-81)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#18)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#34)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol#34-36)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TRID.sol)#77
